text: Consistent with viral titer results, histological analyses of H&E-stained lung sections revealed that mice injected with PBS alone had severe infiltration in the vessels, bronchioles and alveoli; even mice immunized with killed vaccine or AcHERV-HA showed interstitial/alveolar infiltration and structural damage around bronchioles or vessels (Fig 6C and 6D) . However, mice immunized with AcHERV-VLP had less interstitial and alveolar infiltration, suggesting protection of these structures against viral infection (Fig 6E) .
